content: materials cotton supreme 100% cotton 8 yards us6 knitting needle tapestry needle for weaving in ends **pattern** co60 row 1 knit row 2 k2tog repeat parenthesis all the way around you now have 30 st row 3-7 knit row 8 k2tog repeat parenthesis all the way around you now have 15 st row 9 k1 k2tog repeat parenthesis all the way around you now have 8 st row 10 k2tog repeat parenthesis all the way around you now have 4 st cut yarn & pull through remaining stitches use tail to sew edges together weave in ends and enjoy key k knit co cast on k2tog knit two together st stitch es a little knitty © www alittleknitty com april 2018
